name: Raiders

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: This Stand may re-roll failed Hit rolls when performing a Clash Action.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Tenacious (1)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may ignore a number of failed Resolve Tests equal to its Tenacious value.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Raiders Regiment may take up to two of the following Officers: Captain (20 points), Shield Biter (15 points)

specialRules.name: Barrage (5) (14", Precise Shot)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands.

specialRules.name: War-Brethren
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment gain the benefits of the Tribal Tactics the [Character] Stand, whose Warband they are part of, has selected.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (16")
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value multiplied by the Regiment's number of Stands.

specialRules.name: Flank
specialRules.description: Once per Round, during this Regiment's Activation, it may perform a free Retreat Action after completing its Action.

specialRules.name: Opportunists
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands with 6 or more Wounds total than are in base contact with this Stand suffer -1 to their Resolve Characteristic.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

name: Huskarls

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Untouchable
specialRules.description: Once per Round, during this Regiment's Activation, it may perform a free Withdraw and Reform Action after completing its Action.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Huskarl Regiment may take up to two of the following Officers: Thegn (20 points), Skald (20 points)

name: Ulfhednar

specialRules.name: Vanguard (4)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation with a maximum March Distance of 4".

specialRules.name: Tenacious (1)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may ignore a number of failed Resolve Tests equal to its Tenacious value.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Ulfhednar Regiment may take one of the following Officers: Savage (30 points), Shield Biter (15 points)

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Fearsome
specialRules.description: Enemy models suffer a -1 penalty to Morale tests when in base contact with models with this rule.

specialRules.name: Oblivious
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not suffer penalties to its Clash value for charging through Hindering Terrain.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

specialRules.name: Blessed
specialRules.description: This Regiment may re-roll all failed Hit rolls when attacking [Fiend] Regiments.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: This Regiment may be the Target of a Friendly [Character] Stand's Spellcasting Action regardless of the Spell's Range.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Stand adds +1 to its Defense Characteristic against Attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: Unengaged Stands in this Regiment inflict 2 Attacks as support.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment can perform Volley Actions while in contact with Enemy Regiments.

specialRules.name: Opportunists
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation.

specialRules.name: Irregular
specialRules.description: This Regiment suffers a -1 modifier to its Resolve Characteristic for each lost Stand.

specialRules.name: Loose Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may March and Charge through other Friendly Regiments.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (4)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free March Action during its Activation with a maximum March Distance of 4".

specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 2 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: This Regiment is immune to the effects of the Terrifying Special Rule.

specialRules.description: This Regiment does not suffer penalties to its Clash value for charging through Hindering Terrain.

specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.description: This Stand may re-roll failed Hit rolls when performing a Clash Action.

specialRules.name: Linebreaker
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Charge and pass through Enemy Regiments with the Fodder Special Rule.

specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (1)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, it inflicts automatic Hits that reduce the Enemy Stands' Defense Characteristic by 1 when defending against them.

specialRules.name: Linebreaker
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Charge and pass through Enemy Regiments with the Fodder Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Trample (2)
specialRules.description: As part of a Move Action, this Stand may move through Enemy Stands with the Fodder Special Rule, inflicting 2 automatic Hits on them.

specialRules.name: Irregular
specialRules.description: This Regiment suffers a -1 modifier to its Resolve Characteristic for each lost Stand.

specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.description: This Regiment may re-roll all failed Charge rolls.

specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Barrage (6) (8", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value. The Barrage has the Armor Piercing (1) special rule.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 2 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Seizing a New Future
specialRules.description: All Friendly [Titan] Regiments in the Army gain the Fearless Special Rule while within range of an Objective Zone.

specialRules.name: Crushing Avalanche
specialRules.description: All Friendly [Titan] Regiments declaring a Charge Action while within 10" of this Regiment gain the Brutal Impact (+1) and Impact (+2) Special Rules until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Lord of Titans
specialRules.description: A Jotnar Seidr is considered to be a Regiment by itself in addition to it also being a Character Stand.
